name: XLab Sample Product
description:
XLab Sample Product is a demo software item to illustrate product display, SEO optimization (metadata + JSON-LD), and multilingual i18n structure. Ideal for showcasing features, UI/UX testing, and checkout flow experiments.

  • i18n structure (vi/en)
  • SEO ready: metadata + JSON-LD Product
  • Extensible: versions, options, and pricing
shortDescription: Sample product for UI/SEO/i18n demo at XLab.
features: Extensible model: versions, options, and pricing

versions.name: Default
versions.description: Default version with complete UI/SEO/i18n demo features
